summary: 2009  was a common year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: This is a list of notable Irish people who were born on the island of Ireland, in either the Republic of Ireland or Northern Ireland, and have lived there for most of their lives. Also included on the list are people who were not born in Ireland, but have been raised as Irish, have lived there for most of their lives or in regards to the Republic of Ireland, have adopted Irish citizenship . The names are sorted by surname.
title: Frank McCourt (writer)
